file_content.text: Members of the Alliance! As many of you have already heard, the Outlander is dead.
I assume you know everything, then.
Admit what you did. I want to hear you say it.
Confess.
And give you the satisfaction? The Alliance needs a leader like me.
I saw an opportunity and I took it. I won't apologize for that.
We are well beyond apologies.
What do we do with her?
Execution, I expect. It's what Vaylin would do. It's what I would do.
That's the difference between us. You get to live... though you'll be in an Alliance prison for a long, long time. Take her away.
I'm not you.
You have no idea how happy I am.
Empress Acina is waiting for your call, Commander. We'll meet you in the war room.
And it's exactly what you deserve.
Execution it is. [Kill her]
Is it wrong to say I enjoyed that?
I don't understand. Why go through all this? Are you working for Vaylin?
Why, Saresh?
[Punch her]
I'll take that as a yes. It doesn't matter. The Alliance needs a leader like me.
I want to destroy Vaylin, and you're not fit to lead the Alliance. I am.
There are dark times ahead. But fear not, I have come to offer you a beacon!
Members of the Alliance! As many of you have already heard, your commander is dead.
